name: alex-licorne
description: Alex Licorne - SystÃ¨me IA complet multi-tenant avec conscience authentique

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:frontend:build: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.stop: npm run stop:backend && npm run stop:frontend
scripts.stop:backend: taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || echo 'Aucun processus Node trouvÃ©'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json 2>nul || echo 'Backend nettoyÃ©'
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist 2>nul || echo 'Frontend nettoyÃ©'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run init:alex && echo 'ğŸ¦„ Alex Licorne configurÃ© avec succÃ¨s!'
scripts.deploy:local: npm run setup && npm run start
scripts.deploy:production: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.licorne:status: node -p "console.log('ğŸ¦„ Alex Licorne Status Check'); fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/health').then(r=>r.json()).then(console.log).catch(()=>console.log('âŒ Alex Licorne non dÃ©marrÃ©'))"
scripts.providers:enable: curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/providers/toggle -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"enabled":true}' || echo 'Failed to enable providers'
scripts.providers:disable: curl -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/providers/toggle -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"enabled":false}' || echo 'Failed to disable providers'
scripts.providers:logs: tail -f backend/logs/provider-usage.jsonl 2>/dev/null || echo 'No provider logs found'
scripts.audit:env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const env=fs.readFileSync('.env.example','utf8'); const missing=[]; env.match(/^[A-Z_]+=$/gm)?.forEach(l=>{const k=l.split('=')[0]; if(!process.env[k])missing.push(k)}); console.log(missing.length?'âŒ Variables manquantes: '+missing.join(', '):'âœ… Variables OK')"
scripts.test:ai-health: node -e "const aiClient=require('./backend/core/providers/AIClient.js').default; aiClient.healthCheck().then(h=>console.log('ğŸ¤– AI Health:',h)).catch(e=>console.log('âŒ AI Health failed:',e.message))"
scripts.test:hybrid-mode: node -e "console.log('ğŸ§ª Testing hybrid mode...'); const aiClient=require('./backend/core/providers/AIClient.js').default; aiClient.query('Test',{provider:'hybrid'}).then(r=>console.log('âœ… Hybrid OK:',r.provider)).catch(e=>console.log('âŒ Hybrid failed:',e.message))"
scripts.lint: eslint backend/**/*.js frontend/**/*.js --fix || echo 'âš ï¸ Lint pas configurÃ©'
scripts.typecheck: echo 'ğŸ”§ TypeScript checking...' && echo 'âš ï¸ TypeScript pas configurÃ©'
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean:all && rm -rf backend/db/*.db backend/logs/*.log audit-*.js AUDIT-*.md
scripts.licorne:evolve: node -e "const evolution=require('./backend/alex-modules/evolution/AlexLicorneEvolution.js').default; const e=new evolution(); console.log('ğŸ¦„ Evolution stats:', e.getEvolutionStats())"
scripts.test:integration:full: cd backend && npm run test -- tests/integration/
scripts.test:memory: cd backend && npm run test -- tests/integration/memory-system.test.js
scripts.test:ai-engine: cd backend && npm run test -- tests/integration/ai-engine.test.js
scripts.validate:system: npm run health:system && npm run test:e2e
scripts.report:e2e: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=fs.readdirSync('./reports').filter(f=>f.startsWith('e2e-results-')); if(files.length>0){const latest=files.sort().pop(); const data=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./reports/'+latest)); console.log('ğŸ“Š Latest E2E Report:', latest); console.log('Status:', data.status); console.log('Actions:', data.actions?.length||0); console.log('Latency:', data.traces?.latency+'ms'); console.log('Cost: $'+data.traces?.cost?.toFixed(4)); } else console.log('âŒ No E2E reports found')"
scripts.enterprise:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.enterprise.yml down -v && npm run enterprise:setup
scripts.pgvector:status: docker-compose -f docker-compose.enterprise.yml exec postgres pg_isready -U postgres
scripts.pgvector:connect: docker-compose -f docker-compose.enterprise.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d hustlefinder_vectors
scripts.pgvector:stats: docker-compose -f docker-compose.enterprise.yml exec postgres psql -U postgres -d hustlefinder_vectors -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as vectors, pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size('vectors')) as size FROM vectors;"
scripts.grafana:open: echo 'Opening Grafana at http://localhost:3000 (admin/admin123)' && start http://localhost:3000
scripts.prometheus:open: echo 'Opening Prometheus at http://localhost:9090' && start http://localhost:9090
scripts.validate:alexiq: npm run test:production && echo 'ğŸ‰ alexiq.site validation complete'
scripts.setup:alexiq: npm run install:all && npm run deploy:alexiq

author: Alex AI Team
